main event: Multicolored flashing lights observed in the sky near Laredo AFB, Texas, moving in erratic and irregular motion.
interesting points: The object displayed blinking red lights and then disappeared.
The motion of the object appeared to change direction suddenly.
The object was initially thought to be the planet Venus, but could not be positively identified.
Similar objects were reported by multiple observers on different occasions near Laredo AFB.
One object was described as egg-shaped and baseball-sized, yellowish-white in color.
